text: Rated R is the fourth studio album by Barbadian singer Rihanna. It was released in November 2009 by Def Jam Recordings. Musically, the album is a departure from her 2007 album Good Girl Gone Bad, Rated R features a dark theme compared to her previous albums and features a wide range of genres such as pop, hip hop and R&B.; It was recorded after Rihanna's assault by her then- boyfriend, fellow R&B; singer Chris Brown in the beginning of 2009. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Credits for Rated R adapted from Allmusic. * Mykael Alexander – assistant * Davis Barnett – willy * Beardyman – vocals * Jessie Bonds – guitar * Jay Brown – A&R; * Bobby Campbell – assistant * Chase & Status – producer, musician * James J.
